attributes.action: Expel the Israeli ambassador from the UK
attributes.additional_details: Whole families and defenceless children killed by a people who have more reason than most to ensure this sort of thing does not happen in the modern world. People sitting on hilltops applauding missile strikes on Gaza, human shield when no shelters available to those under attack. No condemnation, just sympathy for the aggressors and stomach churning, cold hearted apologists on mainstream TV. Expel the Israeli Ambassador!
